meanings.sent1: My godsons are like family to me.
meanings.sent2: She has three godsons whom she adores.
meanings.sent3: The godsons were thrilled to be part of the special ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The bond between godsons and their godparents is truly special.
meanings.sent5: The godsons looked up to their godfather with admiration.

meanings.sent2: She proudly introduced her godsons to her friends.
meanings.sent3: The godsons' mischievous antics always bring a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: In her heart, all the godsons held a special place.
meanings.sent5: The group of godsons played together joyfully in the park.
